vehicles.title: Add vehicles to your quote.

drivers.title: Add drivers to your quote.
drivers.subtitle: Add up to six drivers to your quote.

discounts.title: Select your discounts.
discounts.subtitle: Do any of these discounts apply to you?

complete.title: Everything look good?
complete.subtitle: Review what you’ve added so far. If everything looks good, you can submit to get a quote. Don’t worry, you can change your quote and selection at anytime.
